name: Mascarat
description:
A crime has just been committed during the ball celebrating the 100th anniversary of cheese. You have to interrogate the guests and find clues in the mansion. 

To do this, click on the characters and objects you think are suspicious (they become white when hovered on). You have to find the culprit, the weapon, and the room where the crime took place before the time runs out. You can make several guess but be careful as making wrong guesses will make you lose time.

Credits: 

  • Alexandre Deckers - 3D Art
  • Axel Lelaquet - 3D Art
  • Jules / Spatia Design - 2D Art
  • Lucile Lachard - Programming
  • Red Tree - Music
